attributes.action: offer vegetarian/vegan options in schools and colleges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most places only offer cheese and egg mayonnaise options and claim that they have vegetarian options, this isn't a very substantial choice compared to those who eat slaughtered animals. Vegans barely get a see in at all. If there are more vegetarian/vegan options on the menu it will encourage healthy eating, give more options for the lactose intolerant, and include veggies in dinnertime in the dining room.
